title: Native Foods - Costa Mesa
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Fusion
description: Costa Mesa vegan cafe offering an original menu of salads, veggie burgers, sandwiches, rice and noodle bowls, desserts, native fries, and more. In-house tempeh and seitan (wheat meat). Casual setting in a unique, yurt-like space with inside and patio seating. Order at counter and food is brought to your table.
